videos.description: Virginia's Kihei Clark executes a ball-fake to shake off a defender as he knocks down a jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Clark's fake leads to a bucket for Virginia) 2022/01/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Clark's fake leads to a bucket for Virginia

videos.description: Virginia's Kihel Clark uses a spin move to get around a defender for the easy floater.
